Carga de librerías

```{r}
library(readr)
```

Carga de la base

```{r}
titanic <- read_csv("C:/Users/rvarg/Downloads/titanic.csv")
```

Convertir nombres de variables y datos a lowe case

```{r}
titanic<- titanic %>% mutate_all(funs(tolower))
var.names<-tolower(colnames(titanic))
colnames(titanic)<-var.names
```

```{r}
install.packages("vcd")
library(vcd)
doubledecker(survived ~ sex + pclass, data = titanic)
```
